meanings.definition: The frame or structure surrounding a door.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully measured the doorcases before starting to build the new door.
meanings.sent2: The doorcases were painted in a bright color to match the walls of the room.
meanings.sent3: As the doorcases were being installed, the cat tried to squeeze through the gap and got stuck!
meanings.sent4: The doorcases stood tall and sturdy, like guardians protecting the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the doorcases added a touch of elegance to the hallway.

meanings.definition: The space or area immediately surrounding a door.
meanings.sent1: Please keep the area around the doorcases clear to allow for easy opening and closing.
meanings.sent2: The welcome mat was placed right in front of the doorcases to greet visitors.
meanings.sent3: The doorcases were so narrow that only one person could stand in the space at a time.
meanings.sent4: The laughter from the party spilled out from the doorcases into the hallway.
meanings.sent5: A faint draft of cool air brushed against my face as I stood by the doorcases.
